[![](https://i1.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2005/01/2993832_2550397a14.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/2993832/ "photo sharing") [Holborn graffiti](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/2993832/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
Onionbagblogger asked for the return of the random Soho pics, but that’s tricky given that I no longer work in Soho. So, this and the earlier pic are the start of random Holborn pics…
